title: Google\Cloud\SecretManager\V1\Replication\UserManaged\Replica
name: Replica
description:
Represents a Replica for this [Secret][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.Secret].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.Replication.UserManaged.Replica

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.location
params.description: The canonical IDs of the location to replicate data. For example: "us-east1".

params.name: data.customer_managed_encryption
params.description: Optional. The customer-managed encryption configuration of the [User-Managed Replica][Replication.UserManaged.Replica]. If no configuration is provided, Google-managed default encryption is used. Updates to the [Secret][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.Secret] encryption configuration only apply to [SecretVersions][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.SecretVersion] added afterwards. They do not apply retroactively to existing [SecretVersions][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.SecretVersion].

methods.name: getLocation
methods.description:
The canonical IDs of the location to replicate data.

For example: "us-east1".

methods.name: getCustomerManagedEncryption
methods.description:
Optional. The customer-managed encryption configuration of the [User-Managed Replica][Replication.UserManaged.Replica]. If no configuration is provided, Google-managed default encryption is used.

Updates to the [Secret][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.Secret] encryption configuration only apply to [SecretVersions][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.SecretVersion] added afterwards. They do not apply retroactively to existing [SecretVersions][google.cloud.secretmanager.v1.SecretVersion].
